dict.acceptation: 用以构成完成式及完成式的不定式，表示已经…；
有，具有；拿，取得；从事；必须，不得不；
〈口〉有产者，有钱人；富国；〈英俚〉欺骗，诈骗；

sent.orig: Note the contraction of how + have, where + have, and what + have.
sent.trans: 注意“how+have, where+have, and what+have”的缩写。

sent.orig: The verb should be in the plural,e.g."have" in "they have".
sent.trans: 这个动词应用复数形式，如they have中的have。

sent.orig: I have to have an out-of-body experience, and I have to have it now.
sent.trans: 我曾经灵魂出壳过，现在我必须再来一次。

sent.orig: No matter you are single or have lover with have. Singles have freedom, couples have accompany.
sent.trans: 要不然就像围城，结了婚的人想念单身的自由，光棍又向往有人陪伴。

sent.orig: We have have breakfast, but they have not have it yet.
sent.trans: 我们吃过早饭了，但他们还没吃。
